ygData.subject: Peace? In the Neo Beast Wars?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Zardus looks at Soundwave. Peace.... Hmm.. I have somethings to take care of, would you care to wait in the conference room while I get it done? he asks.

::Zardus::

Zardus looks at Soundwave.

"Peace.... Hmm.. I have somethings to take care of, would you care to wait in 
the conference room while I get it done?" he asks. He still had the message 
from Megatron's group to respond to, and his wrist comp had reported a hail 
from an unknown bot (Dracona).
